name: Geometry Dash Toxic
description:
Geometry Dash Toxic is a fanmade continuation of the game Geometry Dash World. It currently has 5 short levels with 5 unique soundtracks.

v1.0.1 (MINOR UPDATE)

- Added Achievements (10 Achievements)

- Added 5 Icons and 5 Colors

UPCOMING UPDATE:

v1.0.2 (bug fix if necessary)

v1.1.0 (5 More Levels and More Achievements)
